nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders.Shader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FragmentShader, GeometryShader, VertexShader

    public abstract class Shader
extends Object
    Generic abstract shader class with most of the implementation specifics shared by all shaders. Provides object-oriented interface, I/O, compilation and error checking for GLSL shaders.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shader(String shaderName, File file)
      Constructor, reads the GLSL shader source code from file.
      Shader(String shaderName, String shaderCode)
      Constructor, reads the given GLSL shader source code.

        public Shader(String shaderName,
      File file)
       throws FileNotFoundException
        Constructor, reads the GLSL shader source code from file.
        Parameters:
        shaderName - The internal name for this shader.
        file - The file with the source code for this shader.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - If the file given was not found.

      • init

        public void init(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
          throws CompilationFailedException
        Initialization method for any shader. Compiles and checks code.
        Parameters:
        gl - The global openGL instance.
        Throws:
        CompilationFailedException - If the compilation of the GLSL code generated any errors.

      • getShaderPointer

        public int getShaderPointer()
                     throws UninitializedException
        Getter for the OpenGL-internal pointer.
        Returns:
        the OpenGL-internal Pointer to this shader.
        Throws:
        UninitializedException - If the shader is not initialized before this method is called.
